channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:37 Air alert in Chernihiv region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 🔴 09:37 Air alert in Chernihiv region. Follow for further updates. #Chernihiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 08:47 Threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further updates.
item.description: 🟢 08:47 Threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further updates. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 08:24 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 08:24 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling.
